name: MTLDeviceLocation
desc: Options describing possible locations for the GPU.

items.name: case builtIn
items.desc: The GPU is built into the device.

items.name: case slot
items.desc: The GPU is connected to a slot inside the computer.

items.name: case external
items.desc: The GPU is connected via an external interface, such as Thunderbolt.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: The GPU's location is not specified or cannot be determined.
